author: Ben Zimmer
title: Plots, Politics and the Meaning of ‘Crisis Actors’
text:
After the Feb. 14 school shooting in Parkland, Fla., a sickeningly familiar conspiracy theory sprung up online. Across social media, a crackpot notion spread that the shooting was actually staged and that the teenage survivors from Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School were nothing more than “crisis actors.”
The same baseless charge has been levied against survivors of mass shootings going back to 2012. But where did the phrase “crisis actor” come from? Despite its current scaremongering usage, the origins of the expression...
